poem:
Title: "In The Nets of Neglect"

In the skins of Sunrise, the Spectre of promises hangs,
Rishi, the Rainmaker, dealt words that spun a safety song.
Now, we stand in the shadow of the unsaid, 
terrors balanced on tips of tongues, evictions etched into eyelids,
Legislation lingers unseen, like smoke,
that toxic taint trailing into the unstirred stillness,
before the ever-coming election…always the impending storm.
